languages.text: "Люди горят! Горят люди! Ой, туши, туши скорее!" {n}— голоса доносятся до вас сквозь залепившие глаза мутные потоки чего-то густого и скверно пахнущего, что выплеснули вам на голову добровольные спасатели.{/n}

"They're on fire! On fire! Put them out, put them out, quick!" {n}The voices come to you through streams of something thick and foul — your eyes are covered with whatever your unbidden saviours saw fit to splash over your head.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Люди горят! Горят люди! Ой, туши, туши скорее!" {n}— голоса доносятся до вас сквозь залепившие глаза мутные потоки чего-то густого и скверно пахнущего, что выплеснули вам на голову добровольные спасатели.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "They're burning! People are burning! Put them out, put them out, quick!" {n}The voices come to you through the rivulets of something thick and foul — your eyes are covered with whatever your gratuitous saviors saw fit to splash onto your head.{/n}

"They're burning! People are burning! Put them out, put them out, quick!" {n}The voices come to you through the rivulets of something thick and foul — your eyes are covered with whatever your gratuitous saviors saw fit to splash onto your head.{/n}

"They're on fire! On fire! Put them out, put them out, quick!" {n}The voices come to you through streams of something thick and foul — your eyes are covered with whatever your unbidden saviours saw fit to splash over your head.{/n}

"They're on fire! On fire! Put them out, put them out, quick!" {n}The voices come to you through streams of something thick and foul — your eyes are covered with whatever your unbidden saviours saw fit to splash over your head.{/n}

"They're on fire! On fire! Put them out, put them out, quick!" {n}The voices come to you through streams of something thick and foul — your eyes are covered with whatever your unbidden saviours saw fit to splash over your head.{/n}

languages.text: “这个人着火了！着火了！快把火扑灭！快点！”{n}伴随着急切的喊声，各种浓稠而污浊的东西朝你泼了过来。那些不请自来的救助者们把他们自认为合适的东西泼到了你的头上，把你的眼睛都挡住了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They're on fire! On fire! Put them out, put them out, quick!" {n}The voices come to you through streams of something thick and foul — your eyes are covered with whatever your unbidden saviours saw fit to splash over your head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这个人着火了！着火了！快把火扑灭！快点！”{n}伴随着急切的喊声，各种浓稠而污浊的东西朝你泼了过来。那些不请自来的救助者们把他们自认为合适的东西泼到了你的头上，把你的眼睛都挡住了。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Están ardiendo! ¡Ardiendo! ¡Apagadles, rápido!». {n}Las voces te llegan a través de regueros de algo espeso e inmundo. Tienes los ojos llenos de lo que sea que tus voluntariosos salvadores han usado para remojarte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They're on fire! On fire! Put them out, put them out, quick!" {n}The voices come to you through streams of something thick and foul — your eyes are covered with whatever your unbidden saviours saw fit to splash over your head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Están ardiendo! ¡Ardiendo! ¡Apagadles, rápido!». {n}Las voces te llegan a través de regueros de algo espeso e inmundo. Tienes los ojos llenos de lo que sea que tus voluntariosos salvadores han usado para remojarte.{/n}

languages.text: 「燃えてる！燃えてるぞ！早く火を消せ！」{n}ドロドロとした悪臭を放つ液体を浴びた方角から、さまざまな声が聞こえてきた。救世主たちが鎮火に適当とみなした何かで、目は覆われてしまっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They're on fire! On fire! Put them out, put them out, quick!" {n}The voices come to you through streams of something thick and foul — your eyes are covered with whatever your unbidden saviours saw fit to splash over your head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「燃えてる！燃えてるぞ！早く火を消せ！」{n}ドロドロとした悪臭を放つ液体を浴びた方角から、さまざまな声が聞こえてきた。救世主たちが鎮火に適当とみなした何かで、目は覆われてしまっている。{/n}

languages.text: "Sie stehen in Flammen! Sie brennen! Löscht sie, löscht sie, schnell!" {n}Die Stimmen dringen durch etwas Zähes und Stinkendes zu dir – deine Augen sind bedeckt mit was immer deine ungebetenen Retter dir über den Kopf geschüttet haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They're on fire! On fire! Put them out, put them out, quick!" {n}The voices come to you through streams of something thick and foul — your eyes are covered with whatever your unbidden saviours saw fit to splash over your head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sie stehen in Flammen! Sie brennen! Löscht sie, löscht sie, schnell!" {n}Die Stimmen dringen durch etwas Zähes und Stinkendes zu dir – deine Augen sind bedeckt mit was immer deine ungebetenen Retter dir über den Kopf geschüttet haben.{/n}

languages.text: « {mf|Il|Elle} est en feu ! Éteignez les flammes, vite ! » {n}Les voix vous parviennent à travers un flot d'une substance épaisse et répugnante : vos yeux sont recouverts de ce que vos sauveurs ont jugé bon de vous jeter au visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They're on fire! On fire! Put them out, put them out, quick!" {n}The voices come to you through streams of something thick and foul — your eyes are covered with whatever your unbidden saviours saw fit to splash over your head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Il|Elle} est en feu ! Éteignez les flammes, vite ! » {n}Les voix vous parviennent à travers un flot d'une substance épaisse et répugnante : vos yeux sont recouverts de ce que vos sauveurs ont jugé bon de vous jeter au visage.{/n}

languages.text: "Yanıyorlar! Çabuk! Söndürün! Söndürün hadi!" {n}Yoğun ve iğrenç bir şey başından aşağıya akarken sesler duyuyorsun. Gözlerin, davetsiz kurtarıcıların kafana boca etmeyi uygun gördüğü maddeyle kaplanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They're on fire! On fire! Put them out, put them out, quick!" {n}The voices come to you through streams of something thick and foul — your eyes are covered with whatever your unbidden saviours saw fit to splash over your head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yanıyorlar! Yanıyorlar! Söndürün! Çabuk söndürün!" {n}Yoğun ve iğrenç bir şeyin akışı arasından sesler duyuyorsun. Gözlerin, davetsiz kahramanların kafana fışkırtmayı uygun gördüğü maddeyle kaplanmış bir hâlde.{/n}
